text.div:
This case-sensitive code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/reason-medication-given defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
a NoneNo reason known.
b Given as OrderedThe administration was following an ordered protocol.
c EmergencyThe administration was needed to treat an emergency.

name: ReasonMedicationGivenCodes
title: Reason Medication Given Codes
description: This value set is provided as an example. The value set to instantiate this attribute should be drawn from a robust terminology code system that consists of or contains concepts to support the medication process.
copyright: This material derives from the HL7 Terminology (THO). THO is copyright Â©1989+ Health Level Seven International and is made available under the CC0 designation. For more licensing information see: https://terminology.hl7.org/license

concept.definition: The administration was following an ordered protocol.
The administration was needed to treat an emergency.
